metadata.title: CVE-2021-47348 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Avoid HDCP over-read and corruption Instead of reading thedesired 5 bytes of the actual target field, the code was reading 8. Thiscould result in a corrupted value if the trailing 3 bytes were non-zero, soinstead use an appropriately sized and zero-initialized bounce buffer, andread only 5 bytes before casting to u64.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
